posts.post_content:
I can't decide if this card is good or not...  
The pair of vigilance with [haste](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=174952) or [flying](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=193767) offers speed or evasion (both attack-oriented) while still being able to block. First strike + vigilance seems to favor more of the blocking aspect of it, though. Also, this card is green, where creatures can be pumped by any number of means, while two of the three abilities are predominately white.  
But 2/3?
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
*"Gatherer says there's a flavor text on the tenth edition version but I don't think there is."* -heenaheena  
  
Newer foils don't have reminder texts, and instead usually have a flavor text if they didn't before.  
*(Reminder texts are in parentheses and are italicized, often stating rules we already know.)*
posts.html:
